A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The action scenes and cgi looked nice. Plot has way to may holes in it\, or stuff that just doesn't make any sense. One part seemed to be a political statement and that was the only reason for it to be in the movie. I feel the director and the ceo of lucas films\, don't care about Star Wars (1 - 7) when it comes to cannon\, lore\, or telling a story. They are just milking the cash cow called \"Star Wars\". Same goes for EA making the Star Wars Battlefront 2\, with the issue of buying loot crates / pay to win/ gambling.
